verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: he rejected a proposal to build a new U.S. embassy to Israel in Jerusalem for $ 1 billion] .
President Donald Trump said [ARG0: he] [V: rejected] [ARG1: a proposal to build a new U.S. embassy to Israel in Jerusalem for $ 1 billion] .
President Donald Trump said he rejected a proposal to [V: build] [ARG1: a new U.S. embassy to Israel] [ARGM-LOC: in Jerusalem] [ARG3: for $ 1 billion] .
